short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate captivated.works into your existing web browser workflows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Current Captivated users – The Captivated Chrome Extension enables you to quickly start or review a text conversation directly from your browser-based CRM or email application. Review a real SMS conversation with a contact listed in your CRM without having to leave the page. Our extension works in tandem with the Captivated web app to recognize phone numbers on your page and easily see if you’ve had a previous conversation with that contact in Captivated. If you have, the contact’s name will appear on the extension’s number list.
